Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Recent technical failures aboard commercial aircrafts are detailed through harrowing footage aboard the troubled flights and survivors' firsthand accounts.

Clip.Title: 9/11: THE HEARTLAND TAPES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Across America, the morning of September 11, 2001 began routinely, with news and radio broadcasts sharing local human interest stories and traffic reports. But by 9:00 AM, the day's narrative had taken a tragic turn. Most of us are familiar with the national news coverage of 9/11, but the local reporting from TV and radio affiliates across the nation was no less important and no less compelling. This is an account of the tragedy as it unfolded, and as it aired in American cities large and small, told without narration or interviews.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above some of America's greatest landcapes and monuments in stunning HD realism.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the highlands of the Americas to the world-famous tidal flats of the Bay of Fundy, this exploration of Nova Scotia reveals some of the world's best-kept secrets - here, on the edge of Canada.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Inquire as to whether the idea of a perfect society is, indeed, possible.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An east coast shipper creates a private naval fleet to seize American ships.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From St. John's heading north, the Newfoundland coastline is a maze of iconic bays and inlets - from world-famous Fogo Island, to the abandoned fishing settlements along the island's Northern peninsula.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Technology is advancing at a geometric rate. Find out how far we have come and how far our minds are going to innovate.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Her husband lies wounded, unable to walk, so Laura Secord sets out on a long journey to warn the British of a possible American attack.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tecumseh forges an alliance with the British in pursuit of his dream of a unified First Nations.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: Steep Road to the Oasis: Kyrgyzstan & Uzbekistan
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Visit the new cities that have emerged near the border between Kyrgyzstan and China, and the people who live side-by-side in harmony amidst the uncertainties after the collapse of the former Soviet Union.

Clip.Title: NAZI TEMPLE OF DOOM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover the astonishing secrets behind a recently found artifact. Our investigation uncovers a story of intrigue, shady deals, and a plot by Nazi leader Heinrich Himmler to create a sinister Camelot inside "The Nazi Temple of Doom," Germany's Wewelsburg Castle.

Clip.Title: MISSION TO MURDER HITLER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The operation Valkyrie to kill Hitler was led by German resistance willing to turn traitor to save lives. See how the plot was nearly carried out, through gripping re-enactments, and firsthand interviews from members of the resistance.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: Steep Road to the Oasis: Kyrgyzstan & Uzbekistan
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Visit the new cities that have emerged near the border between Kyrgyzstan and China, and the people who live side-by-side in harmony amidst the uncertainties after the collapse of the former Soviet Union.
